name: Footwork Patterns
description: Develop powerful, rhythmic stomp-based footwork sequences.

cards.title: Stomp Step
cards.description: A strong, grounded stomp movement performed in sync with industrial beats.
bulletpoints: Keep knees slightly bent for shock absorption
Land on the beat for maximum impact
Use controlled energy to avoid excessive strain
cards.summaryText: Drive grounded stomps into the beat while staying cushioned and precise.

cards.title: Cross Stomp Transition
cards.description: A footwork transition combining stomp steps with side-to-side movement.
bulletpoints: Time each movement precisely with the music
Experiment with different tempos to build endurance
cards.summaryText: Cross-step your stomps to swing side-to-side without losing power.
